title: Sentiment Is Still Bearish... But Two Markets Offer Bullish Opportunities

media:group.media:title: Sentiment Is Still Bearish... But Two Markets Offer Bullish Opportunities
media:group.media:description:
No matter where you look these days, fear is all around us. Most headlines will make you feel like the world is ending. Of course, there is a lot to be concerned about right now around the world. So it's understandable why folks are feeling spooked about the markets. On this episode of Making Money With Matt McCall, Matt shares another interview from Stansberry Research's 20th annual conference. He welcomes Jared Dillian to the show.

Jared is the editor of the Daily Dirtnap – a market newsletter with a reader base of thousands. Jared is a sentiment trader... And he also uses technical analysis in his investing strategy. So he's fully aware that bearish sentiment has taken hold of investors. But as they discuss, this is a bullish signal to pay attention to. Jared also reveals two markets he has been watching recently. You won't want to miss this show.

#investing #stockmarket  #federalreserve

2:25 Investor Sentiment & Market Reaction to Fed
6:11 When Will the Bear Market Bottom Out?
10:02 Europe and Emerging Markets
